statements: UPDATE EcologicalInteractions SET interaction_description = 'Mutualistic relationship' WHERE interaction_id = 1;

UPDATE EcologicalInteractions SET species_one='Tiger', interaction_description='Predator-prey relationship' WHERE interaction_id=101
UPDATE EcologicalInteractions SET interaction_type='Symbiotic', species_two='Tree' WHERE interaction_id=202
UPDATE Species SET habitat = 'Forest', diet = 'Omnivore' WHERE species_id = 1;
UPDATE Interactions SET interaction_description = 'Mutualistic interaction' WHERE interaction_id = 3;
UPDATE Species SET habitat='Rainforest', diet='Insects' WHERE species_id=1;
UPDATE Interactions SET interaction_description='Mutualistic relationship between bees and flowers.' WHERE interaction_id=3;
UPDATE ecological_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Predation' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE habitat_information SET habitat_description = 'Tropical rainforest habitat' WHERE habitat_name = 'Amazon Rainforest';
UPDATE ecological_interactions SET interaction_type = 'predation' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE species_adaptations SET adaptation_description = 'Increases water retention' WHERE adaptation_type = 'physiological'

UPDATE EcologicalInteractions SET interaction_type = 'Predation', interaction_description = 'Interaction where one species preys on another' WHERE interaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE SpeciesAdaptations SET adaptation_type = 'Camouflage', adaptation_description = 'Adaptation that allows a species to blend in with its surroundings' WHERE species_id = 'a8098c1a-f86e-11da-bd1a-00112444be1e';
UPDATE EcologicalInteractions SET interaction_description = 'Competition for resources' WHERE interaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'Predation' WHERE interaction_id = 1;
UPDATE species SET population_size = 1000, habitat_type = 'Forest' WHERE species_id = 2;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'predation' WHERE species1_name = 'Lion' AND species2_name = 'Zebra';
UPDATE species SET habitat_type = 'savanna' WHERE species_name = 'Zebra';
